title: Screen Freezes and Loud Buzzing Noise as Game Starts
body: I've never had this issue in the past but for whatever reason, when I get in game, the game freezes and there's a very loud buzzing noise and I am forced to hard shutdown my computer. I can't alt-tab, ctrl alt delete or anything. It first started about a month ago and I started playing again a couple of weeks ago. I played 1 game with no issues and ever since that I've had the same issue. 2 games I was marked as a leaver because of it and I've tested it in a custom today and it's still happening. I wasn't sure if repairing the client would help or what else would be the problem so I was hoping somebody would know here!

replies.body: The buzzing noise and freezing has been an issue for a few players after a Windows 10 update.  The update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been interact poorly with league.  Disabling it will get you fixed up!
